summary: A flight manifest for a Boeing 727 aircraft (tail number N908JE) operated by JEGE INC, listing Jeffrey Epstein as a passenger. The document appears to be a standard aviation record showing flight details, fuel, and passenger count.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as passenger number 1 on a flight manifest for a Boeing 727 aircraft (tail number N908JE) operated by JEGE INC.

events.title: Flight on Epstein's Boeing 727
events.description: A flight occurred using Jeffrey Epstein's Boeing 727 aircraft (tail number N908JE), operated by his company JEGE INC, with Epstein listed as a passenger.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as a passenger on a flight manifest for his Boeing 727 aircraft (tail number N908JE).
The aircraft was operated by JEGE INC, a company associated with Epstein.
The flight occurred in 2004, as indicated by the document date.
The manifest is a standard aviation record, noting details like fuel (gallons and pounds) and flight parameters.
The document is part of a series of flight records (referencing EFTA00019443).
